phase.name: Image Upload and Basic Placement
phase.goal: Allow curators to upload 2D images, enter basic metadata, and place them on walls in the Satellit room.

in.item: Upload dialog with title, artist, short text, dimensions
Rendering 2D artworks as framed quads on walls

out.item: No versioning UI (only current working state)

backend.item: Implement /upload for image files, returning a media_url after storage.
Create /artworks and /artworks/:id/assets endpoints to store metadata and asset records.
Create /versions/:versionId/instances or similar to register ArtworkInstances with transforms.

frontend.item: Add drag & drop area in planner view for images.
On drop, open a dialog for metadata entry (title, artist, text, dimensions).
Compress images client-side and send to /upload; then create Artwork and Asset records via API.
On drop onto the 3D scene, use raycasting to compute the wall hit point and create an ArtworkInstance there.
Render image as a textured plane with a simple frame in the 3D room.

successCriteria.item: A curator can upload an image, enter metadata, and see it as a framed artwork on a wall.
ArtworkInstances persist via backend and reload correctly when reopening the planner.
